jobTitle: Intern- Pharma Technical Operations- Knowledge Management
jobDescription: This internship will be responsible forSupporting Global Technical Development colleagues on Virtual Product Home (VPH) project: document management and migrations into VPHContributing to 2018 Knowledge Management activities, such as semantic search, numeric search, and building active communities of practice Providing customer support for VPH systems, including Microsoft Sharepoint, Documentum, and custom IT solutionsQualifications:Understanding of biochemical technical development processes (desirable but not required)High level of customer service and detail orientedUnderstanding of computer science principles, data science, or knowledge management (desirable but not required)...
